name: Leather Case
description:
<meta http-equiv="refresh" content=".1; url=http://www.capitaleyewear.com/case">

When we sat down to design our case we wanted it to reflect the same ideals we follow when making our glasses--handmade in the USA one at a time with quality materials.

The result is a beautiful semi-hard case, handmade in San Francisco with top-grain leather sourced from Italy.

We include one of these cases with every pair of our glasses but sell them individually for anyone who wants a beautiful case with outstanding protection.

name: Henry - Limited Edition
description:
- Limited Edition. Only 25 Units Made.
- Handmade in San Francisco, California
- Sustainably Harvested Walnut Hardwood Grown in the USA
- Carl Zeiss Vision Lenses With 100% UV Protection 
- Stretch to Fit Hinges 
- Water Resistant 
- 90 Day Warranty 
- Frame measurements 50-24-140

name: Gift Certificate
description:
All the best gifts are made by hand!  

Give the gift of handmade Capital sunglasses and let the lucky receiver pick the style they like they best.

We'll email you a gift code and send a hardcopy certificate printed on handmade kraft paper so they'll still have something amazing to open.

Starting at $50

name: Polarized Upgrade
description: Add this to your cart to upgrade to polarized lenses. Polarized lenses reduce glare so you can see further and more clearly. When you try on a pair of polarized Capital sunglasses you'll be amazed by their clarity and sharpness.
